Package hydra.graph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Comparison.PartialVisitor<R>  
    Comparison.Visitor<R>  
    TypeClass.PartialVisitor<R>  
    TypeClass.Visitor<R>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationClass<A>
    A typeclass-like construct providing common functions for working with annotations
    Comparison
    An equality judgement: less than, equal to, or greater than
    Comparison.EqualTo  
    Comparison.GreaterThan  
    Comparison.LessThan  
    Element<A>
    A graph element, having a name, data term (value), and schema term (type)
    Graph<A>
    A graph, or set of name/term bindings together with parameters (annotations, primitives) and a schema graph
    Primitive<A>
    A built-in function
    TermCoder<A,X>
    A type together with a coder for mapping terms into arguments for primitive functions, and mapping computed results into terms
    TypeClass
    Any of a small number of built-in type classes
    TypeClass.Equality  
    TypeClass.Ordering
